code: import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import"./AddUser.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddUser=()=>{const[username,setUsername]=useState("");const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const[success,setSuccess]=useState(false);const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();setLoading(true);setError(null);axios.post("http://127.0.0.1:5000/users",{username,email}).then(()=>{setSuccess(true);setLoading(false);setUsername("");setEmail("");}).catch(error=>{setError("Error adding user. Please try again.");setLoading(false);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"add-user",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Add a New User"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Username",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",disabled:loading,children:loading?"Adding...":"Add User"})]}),success&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"success-message",children:"User added successfully!"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"error-message",children:error})]});};export default AddUser;
